metadata.title: CVE-2018-9275 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In check_user_token in util.c in the Yubico PAM module (aka pam_yubico)2.18 through 2.25, successful logins can leak file descriptors to the authmapping file, which can lead to information disclosure (serial number of adevice) and/or DoS (reaching the maximum number of file descriptors).

criterions.comment: yubico-pam package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
